Remember to check us out on

font.b: Check in on Blue Devilathletics by visiting the

img.div: Welcome to Brookville Local Schools. Whether you are a member of our community or a guest visiting our website, I am happy to share the wonderful experiences taking place here daily. The mission statement of Brookville Local Schools "...is to challenge, prepare and support all students to realize their full potential." While that statement speaks to the core of our purpose, we are ...

div.class: clearfix panel content hidden-xs resource-panel goToBottom

span.p: To those families that rely on breakfast and lunch food from school subsidized programs -food will be distributed Monday, May 4 and Monday, May 18 from 10am to 1pm in the circle drive in front of the high school. Two weeks of food will be provided each of these dates. If you have questions regarding this distribution or absolutely can not make these times please call, 937-833-2181. If no one answers, leave a message on the voicemail and we will return your call.
